thread.title: Cologix's Chief Technology Officer, Matt Spencer, Named Mission Critical Facility Manager Of The Year

author: cnbc.com
title: Cologix's Chief Technology Officer, Matt Spencer, Named Mission Critical Facility Manager Of The Year
text:
DENVER, March 20, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Cologix â„¢, a network and cloud neutral interconnection and data center company, announced today that its Chief Technology Officer, Matt Spencer, has been recognized as, " Facility Manager of the Year " by Mission Critical Magazine. The annual award celebrates excellence, innovation and outstanding performance by an exemplary data center facility manager.
Matt has been leading operations for Cologix since its inception and has been instrumental in helping grow the Company footprint to 25 prime interconnection locations across nine strategic North American edge markets. Matt has also been a key leader in integrating 10 acquired operations into Cologix as well as bringing new market expansions online. All of these projects included planning and project management expertise to deliver an industry leading solution.
Matt has platform-wide responsibility of 24x7 customer support, critical infrastructure, facilities, and operational direction in each of Cologix's data centers. Matt's leadership, experience and partnership ensure that Cologix's high standard of "uptime all the time" is consistently adhered to across its platform for the benefit of its customers.
"I have the honor and privilege of leading an exceptional operations team that work collaboratively with our engineering and construction partners to continually produce a world class product and are always contemplating new and creative solutions to deliver best-in-class solutions that meet or exceed our customers' needs," Matt said. "We approach our work with a curiosity to always learn and improve upon existing processes and technologies in order to meet our golden rule of uptime all the time for our customers and we strive to achieve that every day," he added.
"We are delighted and thankful that Mission Critical magazine recognized Matt as the Facility Manager of the Year," stated Grant van Rooyen, Chief Executive Officer, Cologix. "Operational excellence is the core of our business and our Customers can trust that the experience, dedication and commitment that Matt and his team deliver, are truly unparalleled. Matt is an exemplary leader who is continually looking for innovative solutions to integrate and achieve operational excellence and we are incredibly proud to have him leading operations for us."
About Cologix Inc.
Cologix provides reliable, secure, scalable data center and interconnection solutions from 25 prime interconnection locations across 9 strategic North American edge markets. Over 1,600 leading network, managed services, cloud, media, content, financial services and enterprise customers trust Cologix to support their business critical infrastructure and connect them to customers, vendors and partners. Our dedicated, experienced local teams and scalable solutions enable us to provide industry-leading customer service and the ability to successfully support customers at the Internet's new edge. For a tour of one of our data centers in Columbus, Dallas, Jacksonville, Lakeland, Minneapolis, Montreal, New Jersey, Toronto or Vancouver visit www.cologix.com or email sales@cologix.com .
